channel.title: Can we go hard with style? :)
channel.description:
i am currently working on a synth project, namely putting an axoloti synth in a nectar impact ix61 keyboard, the synth so far is mostly done, and here is a demo video of it in action:
https://youtu.be/SnONwqoMsOk
the only problem i have now is to get the maxtrix layout of the keys right... :confused:
anyone has a pinout for that specific keyboard? (nektar ix61) i also contacted their support if they are willing to help me out. (they won't help me sadly)
anyhow, current features of the patch: each voice (5 voices): - 1 supersquare (7 square osc) with detune amount and mix - 2 supersaws (one of them is 1 octave higher) - lowpass filter with adsr - highpass filter with keytracking - velocity sensitive input
1 global lfo on the voices' pitch input
4 band equalizer
mono delay with filter
simple reverb (thanks mtyas!) with a added low/highpass filter
compressor to prevent output overload
update on last edit (may 11 2016) https://soundcloud.com/da_detuner/melodies
only applied a noise cancellation, see track details for the reason.
current DSP load: ~94% current RAM usage: ~90%

item.title: Can we go hard with style? :)
item.dc:creator: @Inaba ramon
item.description:
@Inaba wrote:

i don't know yet, maybe i will~

also, update on the keyboard pin mappings, i received this message back from the company:

We don't support modification like what you have described.
I'm sorry but I cant give any information about how to do the modification you are wanting.
All the best.

which leaves me with myself, or perhaps others who want to help with a keyboard pin mapping?

Read full topic
item.source: Can we go hard with style? :)

item.title: Can we go hard with style? :)
item.dc:creator: @heatseekerrr Patrick Mitchell
item.description:
@heatseekerrr wrote:

Wow, what an excellent hardstyle sound! I love your project. Any plans to share your patch?

item.title: Can we go hard with style? :)
item.dc:creator: @Inaba ramon
item.description:
@Inaba wrote:

update time! (don't want to edit my first post too often)

renderings:
old version: (first version, no velocity/lfo/delay yet, externally added reverb)

new version: (integrated delay, lfo, velocity, no extra reverb)

edit:

i am now posting all updates in the main post to keep it clean, so this post is getting out of date

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Inaba ramon
item.description:
@Inaba wrote:

i am currently working on a synth project, namely putting an axoloti synth in a nectar impact ix61 keyboard, the synth so far is mostly done, and here is a demo video of it in action:

the only problem i have now is to get the maxtrix layout of the keys right...

anyone has a pinout for that specific keyboard? (nektar ix61)
i also contacted their support if they are willing to help me out. (they won't help me sadly)

anyhow,
current features of the patch:
each voice (5 voices):
- 1 supersquare (7 square osc) with detune amount and mix
- 2 supersaws (one of them is 1 octave higher)
- lowpass filter with adsr
- highpass filter with keytracking
- velocity sensitive input

1 global lfo on the voices' pitch input

4 band equalizer

mono delay with filter

simple reverb (thanks mtyas!) with a added low/highpass filter

compressor to prevent output overload

update on last edit (may 11 2016)

only applied a noise cancellation, see track details for the reason.
